title: 5/5/17 - The GOP Killed American Medicine Yesterday (Rep. Thomas Massie Joins Glenn)
description:
Trump: Australia has better health care than the United States ...The GOP killed American medicine yesterday...Why we should pay close attention to France's election this weekend ...A French history lesson that we should apply to today ...Glenn warns Stephen Colbert that he's in the same divisive place he was in back in 2009 ...Rep. Thomas Massie explains his NO vote on the Obamacare "fix"

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
